description: By default, TOPPRJ files are stored within subdirectories of TopSolid's TopSolidPdm directory (which is created by default as C:/​TopSolidPdm/​ ). The software's user interface encapsulates access to all project files, so TOPPRJ files are not accessed directly by the user.
NOTE: TopSolid uses an embedded Microsoft SQL Server to store project documents and data.
